comment: According to ~ df-subc , the subcategories ` ( Subcat `` C ) ` of a category ` C ` are subsets of the homomorphisms of ` C ` (see ~ subcssc and ~ subcss2 ). Therefore, the set of field homomorphisms is a "subcategory" of the category of division rings. (Contributed by AV, 20-Feb-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)
